code: import React from"react";import Button from"./common/Button";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Pagination=_ref=>{let{currentPage,totalPages,onPageChange}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pagination",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn-primary",btnText:"Previous",disabled:currentPage===1,btnClickHandler:()=>onPageChange(currentPage-1)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"pagination__text",children:["Page ",currentPage," of ",totalPages]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{className:"btn-primary",btnText:"Next",disabled:currentPage===totalPages,btnClickHandler:()=>onPageChange(currentPage+1)})]});};export default Pagination;
